title: Space Faces
summary: A collection of beautiful space themed watch faces
description: Space Faces includes more than 15+ carefully selected backgrounds of planets, moons and galaxiesFeatures: - Highly customizable features and colors- Adjustable screen timeout (from 10 seconds to Always On if needed)- 12/24 hour modes- Date- Configurable and removable analog watch hands- Weather- Google Fit step counter- Watch battery indicator- Supports ambient mode including low-bit ambient and anti-burn in modesDesigned for round Android Wear watches:• Motorola Moto 360 • Motorola Moto 360 Gen 2 (42mm and 46mm)• Asus ZenWatch• Asus ZenWatch 2• Huawei Watch• LG G Watch• LG G Watch R• LG Watch Urbane• Samsung Gear Live• Sony SmartWatch 3• TAG Heuer Connect • Fossil Q FOUNDEROnce you install the app, the watchface will be automatically transferred to your watch which may take several minutes. After that you will be able to select it from your watch or the Android Wear app on your phone.
descriptionHTML:
Space Faces includes more than 15+ carefully selected backgrounds of planets, moons and galaxies

Features:
- Highly customizable features and colors
- Adjustable screen timeout (from 10 seconds to Always On if needed)
- 12/24 hour modes
- Date
- Configurable and removable analog watch hands
- Weather
- Google Fit step counter
- Watch battery indicator
- Supports ambient mode including low-bit ambient and anti-burn in modes



Designed for round Android Wear watches:
• Motorola Moto 360
• Motorola Moto 360 Gen 2 (42mm and 46mm)
• Asus ZenWatch
• Asus ZenWatch 2
• Huawei Watch
• LG G Watch
• LG G Watch R
• LG Watch Urbane
• Samsung Gear Live
• Sony SmartWatch 3
• TAG Heuer Connect
• Fossil Q FOUNDER




Once you install the app, the watchface will be automatically transferred to your watch which may take several minutes. After that you will be able to select it from your watch or the Android Wear app on your phone.
comments: Great! Really love the new faces!
Needs more fonts and planet faces, but pretty good so far.
A nice set of watch faces with lots of options for customization!
